The flagship of the Russian Pacific Fleet missile cruiser “Varyag” and mid-size sea tanker “Pechenga” will arrive today 2 June 2017 to Hong Kong.
“Varyag” will be berthed at the Western Anchorage.
On 5 June (Monday) at 8.00-9.00 a.m. you will be able to see “Varyag” passing to Kai Ğ¢Ğ°Ğº cruise terminal via Victoria Harbour.
On the same day from 11.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. the ship will be open for visits of the general public. To access the ship you must bring your passport and ID.
On 6 June “Varyag” and “Pechenga” will depart early in the morning.
